model.name: Version Consistency Enforcement - All 0.3.0.2 Components Import Only 0.3.0.2
model.description: Ensure all 0.3.0.2 components import only other 0.3.0.2 versions. Fix all cross-version imports and create missing components as 0.3.0.2 versions to maintain ecosystem consistency.
model.rationale: Version consistency is essential for ecosystem integrity. All 0.3.0.2 components must import only 0.3.0.2 versions to prevent dependency conflicts and ensure clean development environment.
acceptance_criteria: No imports to 0.1.x.x, 0.3.0.0, or latest versions from 0.3.0.2 components
Create missing components as 0.3.0.2 versions if needed
Update all import paths to reference 0.3.0.2 versions
Maintain functional compatibility during version updates
Report all missing components during analysis
import_violations_found: HttpServer/0.3.0.2 imports IOR/0.3.0.0, ONCE/0.3.0.0, Scenario/0.1.3.0, User/0.1.3.0
ONCE/0.3.0.2 imports IOR/0.3.0.0, Scenario/0.1.3.0, User/0.1.3.0, HttpServer/0.3.0.0, WsServer/0.3.0.0, P2PServer/0.3.0.0

technical_details.missing_components: Will be identified during import analysis

model.implementation_notes: Systematic analysis and fixing of all cross-version imports to ensure complete ecosystem consistency.
